availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abram G. Wileman (Major in Union Army)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky doctor. Ohio native. Married to Parthena Rice Wileman. Father of Dalton Wileman. Major in the 18th Regiment Kentucky Volunteers.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton, p. 480. Find A Grave, "Abram G. Wileman (1821-1863)," Memorial #10063769, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=10063769 (accessed 5, 23, 2017).
